articles.title: BP profits plunge as oil prices ease - BBC.com
articles.description: The energy giant will hand billions of pounds to investors and ramp up oil production.
articles.content:
Energy giant BP has reported its second highest annual profit in more than a decade, despite it being half the level it announced in the previous year.
Profits were $13.8bn (£11bn) in 2023, down fro… [+4732 chars]

articles.title: I'm not a chatbot – I promise! - Nature.com
articles.description: A journal reviewer accused Lizzie Wolkovich of using ChatGPT to write a manuscript. She hadn’t — but her paper was rejected anyway.
